© OECD 2007 55OTHER TITLESIN THE SERIES / AUTRESTITRES DANSLA SÉRIE The former series knownas " Technical Papers " and " Webdocs " merged in November 2003
into " Development Centre Working Papers " . In the new series, former Webdocs 1-17 follow formerTechnical Papers 1 -212as Working Papers 213 -229.
All these documents may be downloaded from: http://www.oecd.org/dev/wpor obtained via e -mail( dev.contact@oecd.org).
